content:
The units of the missile troops of the Defense Forces were defeated in the 1 area of concentration of personnel, weapons and military equipment, 1 ammunition composition, 1 anti-aircraft missile system "Buk-M1" and 1 radar intelligence complex and control of the Zoo-1 firing.

About thisinformsThe General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

“This night, as a result of the Operation of the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, the Russian ship of the project 22160“ Sergey Kotov ”with a crew on board was affected. Information on the on board of the ship's transport-combat helicopter Ka-29 is checked, ”the message reads.

In addition, during the day, Ukrainian aviation struck 11 areas of concentration of the enemy's personnel.

Recall the army of the Russian Federation56 times tried to break through Ukrainian defensein Novopavlovsky and Avdiivskyi.

As reported by the Armyinform, the situation remains difficult in the Taurian direction, butThe Armed Forces are steadily holding defense.
title: Our art has destroyed the composition of ammunition, Buk-M1 SCR and Zoo-1 RLS
description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about it. “This night, as a result of surgery ...
author: Army Inform
